name: unpublicized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is unpublicized, information about it is not made generally available: It is the kind of change that goes largely unpublicized until a census highlights a trend. The plans were drawn up at an unpublicised meeting in Tokyo last month.
More examplesFewer examplesHe played an important but generally unpublicized role in US trade history. He apparently made a number of unpublicized visits to an office in central Berlin. Until recently, this achievement has been largely unpublicised.
